subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. added a second option for the 400 fans who had to give up their seats at Super Bowl XLV: they can choose to attend any future Super Bowl instead of being limited to the 2012 game.
snippet: The N.F.L. added a second option for the 400 fans who had to give up their seats at Super Bowl XLV: they can choose to attend any future Super Bowl instead of being limited to the 2012 game.
